lines.gurmukhi: mDur bcn smsir n pujs mD krk sbid sir ibK n ibKm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Madhur Bachan Samasari N Pujas Madha , Karak Sabadi Sari Bikh N Bikham Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sweetness of honey cannot match the sweetness of sweetly spoken words. No poison is as discomforting as bitter words.

lines.gurmukhi: mDur bcn sIqlqw imstwn pwn krk sbd sqpq ktu km hY
lines.transliteration_english: Madhur Bachan Seetalataa Misataan Paana , Karak Sabad Satapat Katu Kam Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sweet words cools the mind as cold drinks cool the body and provide comfort (during summer), but highly bitter thing is nothing compared to very sharp and harsh words.

lines.gurmukhi: mDur bcn kY qiRpiq Aau sMqoK swNiq krk sbd AsMqoK doK sRm hY
lines.transliteration_english: Madhur Bachan Kai Tripati Au Santokh Saanti , Karak Sabad Asantokh Dokh Sram Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sweet words render one with peace, satiation and contentment whereas harsh words create restlessness, vice and fatigue.

lines.gurmukhi: mDur bcn lig Agm sugm hoie krk sbd lig sugm Agm hY ]256]
lines.transliteration_english: Madhur Bachan Lagi Agam Sougam Hoi , Karak Sabad Lagi Sougam Agam Hai ?256?

Shabad OS B.translation: Sweet words make a difficult task easy to perform whereas harsh and bitter words make an easy task difficult to accomplish. (256)
